question: What do you do if your wudhu keeps on breaking?
answer:
QUESTION
Imam, i have started praying my 5-times- a-day namaz for a year and recently i have come across a problem. During my namazes I frequently keep breaking my wudhu due to wind. It happens in Fajr when temperatures are quite low so doing wudhu again is quite hard. I do get quite frustrated and end up angry and feeling that my namaz has not been counted. Please could you advise me on what to do.
ANSWER


Share:

Kindly refer to the rules pertaining to a Ma'zur

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
